about_the_game:
Do you wake up in the morning, tired, feeling utterly sad and disappointed with your life? Fear not! Because Insignio Labs has the perfect solution for you. Featuring the all-new Flute Master "Epic Christmas" DLC pack with 3 new tracks to rock your recorder! Never feel sad again. With this brand new rock editing of classical tracks, your world will turn upside down. Mesmerize your neighbours with your recorder skills, entertain children at parties and learn to play awesome new music!


Featuring 3 new Christmas tracks:

- Away in a Manger
- Jingle Bells
- Silent Night

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)
detailed_description:
Do you wake up in the morning, tired, feeling utterly sad and disappointed with your life? Fear not! Because Insignio Labs has the perfect solution for you. Featuring the all-new Flute Master "Epic Christmas" DLC pack with 3 new tracks to rock your recorder! Never feel sad again. With this brand new rock editing of classical tracks, your world will turn upside down. Mesmerize your neighbours with your recorder skills, entertain children at parties and learn to play awesome new music!


Featuring 3 new Christmas tracks:

- Away in a Manger
- Jingle Bells
- Silent Night

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

name: Flute Master - Epic Christmas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

short_description: Flute Master "Epic Christmas" DLC pack features 3 new rock editings of classical tracks Away in a Manger, Jingle Bells and Silent Night. Prepare to rock on with your recorder.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
